intents.name: Generate Invoice
intents.description: Creates invoices for completed transactions, ensuring all necessary details are included.
examples: Create an invoice for the recent sale.
Generate an invoice for transaction ID 12345.
I need an invoice for the last purchase.

intents.name: Store Invoice Details
intents.description: Stores and organizes invoice details for easy tracking and retrieval.
examples: Save the invoice details for future reference.
Store the invoice information in the system.

name: Invoice Manager
scope: Handles tasks related to generating and storing invoices for transactions, ensuring all invoice details are accurately recorded for tracking purposes.
